Subskills.name: Sharp Point
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by crushing lance.

Subskills.name: Devastating Impact
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of crushing lance.

Subskills.name: Annihilating Salvo
Subskills.description: Unleash a shockwave of crushing lances towards target location.

Subskills.name: Precision Blow
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using crushing lance.

Subskills.name: Dormant Javelin
Subskills.description: Every third attack with crushing lance is empowered increasing area of effect radius and damage.

Subskills.name: Finishing Stagger
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Two for One
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional crushing lance from the target to a nearby monster on hit.

Subskills.name: Rapidcast Artillery
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using crushing lance.

Subskills.name: Marked for Javelinstrike
Subskills.description: Throw piercing javelins at monsters hit by crushing lance for a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Landspike
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by crushing lance.

Subskills.name: Pulverizing Shock
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Scorching Quake
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to empower crushing lance causing it to echo an additional time inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Magnetized Glaive
Subskills.description: The lance remains on the ground for a short duration frequently pulsating and pulling monsters towards it on hit.

Subskills.name: Seismic Perforation
Subskills.description: Crushing lance hits the ground with force unleashing shockwaves into all directions.
